She is open to respond at any time and communicate with too caringüôÇ. I will definitely recommend Dr. Malini. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cervical Cerclage,Pregnancy Check Up,Fertility Treatment,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
We have been visiting Dr. Malini since past 3 years after I had a PPROM in 2020. She helped us stay calm and composed with her extremely positive attitude and gave us every minute detail about my condition throughout the time we were trying to conceive, while I was pregnant and finally she helped me deliver our beautiful baby this June. 

As it is very important to be patient, calm and positive while a couple is trying to conceive, Dr. Malini guides you with her experience and very minimal medicinal support. She believes in keeping things mostly natural rather than making the patient eat a lot of medicines. Hence, I could also conceive naturally and not go through IVF and other processes. She is very supportive over emergency calls, messages and makes herself available to attend to your medical needs.

We both strongly recommend her for people who want to have a happy conception and pregnancy journey.

** ****** ** ** ********* *******  she is excellent humankind and down to earth person .  Very good knowledgeable  doctor.  Througt my pregnancy  and Delivery she taken care me alot.  She give simple medicine and motivates us to think positively and never makes us feel afraid .
Anytime she will be open to respond to patients. 
I personally likes her and her treatment. 
Definitely go head to doctor without any doubt.

review:
It was great experience with Doctor Malini,
Initially we planned to go for normal delivery but later during the labour hour my wife could not tolerate the labour pain she wanted to go for C Sec
But doctor convinced us not to go for C we can make it normal within hour an hour the delivery happened, we should be thanking the Doctor for the advise at the right time. I always prepare for Doctor Malini in future.üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüë¶

review: *** ** *** **** ******* I feel myself lucky that I had chosen her. She has supported us through out my 9 months of pregnancy and finally gave us our jackpot just before she herself goes on maternity leave(she did my delivery when she herself is 9th month pregnant and that too in covid Pandemic). Really a very nice doctor. I highly recommend her. Very friendly and responsible doctor.

review: I visited Dr. Malini due to hormonal issues. She was very patient, and she made me feel at ease. She explained everything that I needed to know in order to follow up with my treatment. Her positive attitude is well appreciated.
